column1: Table 6.2.B. Net Summer Capacity Using Primarily Renewable Energy Sources and by State, September 2024 and 2023 (Megawatts)

column2: Summer Capacity at Utility Scale Facilities
column18: Capacity From Utility and Small Scale Facilities

column1:
NM = Not meaningful due to large relative standard error.
Values for 2023 are final. Values for 2024 are preliminary.

Sources: U.S. Energy Information Administration, Form EIA-860, 'Annual Electric Generator Report' and Form EIA-860M, 'Monthly Update to the Annual Electric Generator Report.'
Estimated small scale solar photovoltaic capacity is based on data from Form EIA-861M, Form EIA-861, and from estimation methods described in the technical notes.
